metadata.title: CVE-2022-42824 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue isfixed in tvOS 16.1, macOS Ventura 13, watchOS 9.1, Safari 16.1, iOS 16.1and iPadOS 16. Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclosesensitive user information.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
